"Slona": "This is where many ARKS make their home. Of course, a great number of Meteorn as well."
"There's a good range of facilities available as well, so definitely take a look around."
"Bruder filled me in on the details. I've been waiting for you."
"Alright, I'll tell you what I know."
"During your travels, you might come across what look like giant Mags dotted around Halpha. We call them Regional Mags."
"It's said that \"good things\" may happen if you give items to a Regional Mag."
"If you find any, be sure to offer them something."
